name: Alpha - Absinthe Maduro - Robusto
additionalNotes: The Alpha Cigar Company is dedicated to creating premium absinthe infused cigars. When crafting their Alpha Absinthe Maduro, the company uses the traditional Cuban entubado method, which ensures each cigar has a solid construction to produce a perfect draw. A dark, sweet Mexican San Andres Maduro wrapper surrounds the Alpha Absinthe Maduro’s absinthe-infused Dominican binder, which houses a Nicaraguan filler to create a unique medium to full-bodied smoking experience.
